page.title: 20PUBLIC ADMIN. ACTON/LAVENHAM
page.content: The Parishes of Acton, Gt. Waldingfield Lavenham and Long Melford each has its own elected Parish Council. Councillors are also elected to serve on the Babergh District Council at Hadleigh and the Suffolk County Council at Ipswich. Babergh is in the Parliamen- tary Constituency of South Suffolk and the European Parliamentary Constitu- ency of Suffolk and Harwich. At District County and National level representation is generally aligned to political parties. The current repre- sentation at each level is Conservative in this area. {CREDITS} This modern Domesday Record was compiled on behalf Acton Women's Insti- tute by Marjorie Howard and Betty Kil- mister, assisted by Dinah Toms and Eileen Wood. Photographs by A. Morris. Computer entry by Christine Johnson.
